author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Taste Says ‍Carlo Gonzaga To Resign As CEO
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Taste Holdings Ltd:
* ‍CARLO GONZAGA HAS TENDERED NOTICE OF HIS DECISION TO RESIGN FROM POSITION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER, EFFECTIVE 12 FEBRUARY 2018​
* ‍TYRONE MOODLEY WILL CHANGE HIS FUNCTION FROM NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND BE APPOINTED TO GROUP CEO ROLE EFFECTIVE 12 FEBRUARY 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
